SPECIAL_OPS_SO_UNLOCK_MORE_DESC: 需要取得 &&1 个更多的星星来解锁
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_UNLOCK_SINGLE_DESC: 再取得1个星星就能解锁
MENU_SP_NOTE_EXPLOSIVES_KNIVES_ONLY: 仅限使用爆炸物与近战
SPECIAL_OPS_REVIVE_NAG_HINT: 按下 ^3[{weapnext}]^7 呼叫你的伙伴
SPECIAL_OPS_FAILURE_HINT_TIME:
你用尽了时间
留意剩余时间
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_HIDDEN_SO_GHILLIES_DESC: 在切尔诺贝利附近躲避敌人步兵以及吉利服狙击手的巡逻
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_HIDDEN_SCOUTSNIPER_DESC: 在切尔诺贝利附近躲避敌人步兵以及吉利服狙击手的巡逻
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_AC130_CO_HUNTED_DESC: 使用AC-130空中炮艇洒下死亡之雨, 保护你的同伴
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_AC130_CO_HUNTED_OBJ_DESC:
到达农场地下室
到达西方边界的工作站
到达温室附近的谷仓
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_CHOPPER_INVASION_DESC: 高爆弹药, 加特林机枪, 黑鹰直升机, 开路吧
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_KILLSPREE_FAVELA_DESC: 猎杀并消灭贫民窟暴徒, 尽量不要伤及平民
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_DES: 使用你的摩托雪橇快速下山, 躲避树木, 石头, 和成群的步兵
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ:
在2分钟内完成
在90秒内完成
在70秒内完成
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_DEFUSE_FAVELA_ESCAPE_DESC: 快速穿过贫民窟的市场, 在无可挽回之前寻找并拆除炸弹
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_FOREST_CONTINGENCY_DESC: 使用消音狙击步枪灵巧地在步兵的巡逻中溜走
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_KILLSPREE_INVASION_DESC: 杀死尽可能多的敌人, 杀的越快得分越高
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ASSAULT_OILRIG_DESC: 突入并清理两个充满敌人和人质的致命房间以占领钻油平台
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_DEMO_SO_BRIDGE_DESC: 使用C4, 榴弹发射器, RPG, 哨戒机枪, 粘性手雷等装备摧毁大桥上的每一辆载具
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_SABOTAGE_CLIFFHANGER_DESC: 使用你的消音武器和心跳感应器摧毁空军基地
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_SHOWERS_GULAG_DESC: 在古拉格撕碎敌人防线并全身而退
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_TAKEOVER_OILRIG_DESC:
在钻油平台杀死总共15个无畏战士
这是几乎不可能完成的任务
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_SNOWRACE2_CLIFFHANGER_DES: 在时间耗尽之前驾驶你的摩托雪橇跳过裂缝, 从旗帜中间穿过可获取更多的时间
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_INTEL_BONEYARD_DESC: 在飞机坟场与影子部队和无畏战士交战, 拿取情报并赶至撤离点
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ESCAPE_AIRPORT_DESC: 在装备防爆盾牌的敌人埋伏中杀出血路
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DESC: 以最快速度清除所有敌方目标, 射击平民将无法得到3颗星
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_OBJ_DES:
完成试炼
在45秒内完成
在35秒内完成
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_JUGGERNAUTS_FAVELA_DESC: 仅用爆炸物和近战杀死总共十个无畏战士, 你一定是疯了才会尝试这个
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_CROSSING_SO_BRIDGE_DESC: 在大桥上从索降部队的进攻中杀出血路以到达安全区
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_DEFENSE_INVASION_DESC: 哨戒机枪, 热成像瞄具, 火箭发射器及阔剑地雷, 在五波不同难度的进攻中活下来
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ROOFTOP_CONTINGENCY_DESC: 使用狙击枪, 阔剑地雷和掠食者无人机来防守数波敌人的进攻
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_DOWNLOAD_ARCADIA_DESC: 使用镭射为斯特瑞克标记目标, 逐房逐屋推进
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_TAKEOVER_ESTATE_DESC: 消灭守护庄园的吉利服狙击手, 精英雇佣兵以及无畏战士
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ALPHA_DESC: 掠食者无人机, 贫民窟暴徒, 狙击步枪与潜入, 这些行动简短而又简单
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_BETA_DESC: AC-130炮艇, 摩托雪橇竞速, 装备高爆弹药的加特林机枪, 适合每一个人
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_CHARLIE_DESC: 限时挑战, 爆破突入, 飞机坟场和穿着吉利服的敌人, 这些可开始变得有点难了
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_DELTA_DESC: 暴风雪, 机场, 庄园和大桥, 五个具有挑战性的行动
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ECHO_DESC: 全是无畏战士的钻油平台和贫民窟, 这些行动快速而又残忍
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_KILLSPREE_FAVELA_OBJ_DESC:
30个敌人, 最多6个平民伤亡
40个敌人和狗, 最多4个平民伤亡
50个敌人和狗, 最多3个平民伤亡
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ROOFTOP_CONTINGENCY_OBJ_D:
3波步兵, 1辆吉普和1辆卡车
4波步兵, 2辆吉普和1辆卡车
5波步兵, 3辆吉普和2辆卡车

PMC_DIFFICULTY_HEAVY_DESC: 敌人密度较大,大量敌人占据了关卡,你将难以存活
PMC_DIFFICULTY_MAXIMUM_DESC: 敌人密度非常之高,只有精英才能完成这个任务
PMC_TYPE_ELIMINATION_DESC: 没有时间限制,消灭关卡里的所有威胁
PMC_TYPE_OBJECTIVE_DESC: 在时间耗尽之前完成任务并赶往目标点
PMC_TYPE_DEFEND_DESC: 设置防御地带并在时间结束之前尽可能存活
PMC_DEFEND_FAILED: Keep enemies away from the objective!
PMC_START_ATTACK_USE_HINT: Press and hold ^3&&1^7 on the laptop to skip set up time.
PMC_START_ATTACK_HINT: Approach the laptop to skip set up time.
PMC_CLAYMORE_PICKUP: Press and hold ^3&&1^7 to pickup claymore
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_CUSTOM_DESC: Create your own PMC contract. You choose the map, mode, and settings to play.
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_1_DESC: Sweep and clear mission. Find and kill 25 enemies. Beware of enemy sentry guns and helicopters.
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_1_PRIZE:
$100 per enemy
$500 bonus on mission completion
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_1_UNLOCK: This contract is unlocked by default
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_2_DESC: Timed mission. Infiltrate the enemy position and capture a laptop containing intel, then extract.
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_2_PRIZE:
$100 per enemy
$2000 bonus on mission completion
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_2_UNLOCK: This contract is unlocked by default
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_3_DESC: Hold off an enemy counter attack until reinforcements arrive. Set up sentry guns and use weapon caches to prepare your defence.
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_3_PRIZE:
$25 per enemy
$1500 bonus on mission completion
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_3_UNLOCK: This contract is unlocked by default
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_4_DESC: Sweep and clear mission. Find and kill 85 enemies. Beware of enemy sentry guns and helicopters.
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_4_PRIZE:
$100 per enemy
$2000 bonus on mission completion
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_4_UNLOCK: This contract is unlocked by default
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_5_DESC: Escort friendly troops to their objective while providing air support from an AC-130 gunship
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_5_PRIZE:
$25 per enemy
$3000 bonus on mission completion
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_5_UNLOCK: This contract is unlocked by default
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_6_DESC: Crawl around in a ghillie suit while silently taking down enemies
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_6_PRIZE:
$150 per enemy
$3000 bonus on mission completion
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_6_UNLOCK: This contract is unlocked by default
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_7_DESC: Work with the 'good' Russians to rescue your informant, Nikolai.
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_7_PRIZE:
$50 per enemy
$2500 bonus on mission completion
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_7_UNLOCK: This contract is unlocked by default
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_8_PRIZE:
$100 per enemy
$15000 bonus on mission completion
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_8_UNLOCK: Unlock this contract by successfully completing an objective contract with 2 minutes remaining or more.
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_9_DESC: Desperate times call for desperate measures. Successfully assassinate the russian leader without getting caught.
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_9_PRIZE:
$50 per enemy
$50000 bonus on mission completion
PMC_PMC_CONTRACT_9_UNLOCK: Unlock this contract by successfully completing Sniper Escape on Veteran difficulty.
